title: Five Cheese Ziti
ingredients: ZITI TOPPING: 1 tbsp gresh garlic, chopped
ZITI TOPPING: 3 tbsp flat-leaf Italian parsley, chopped
REMAINING INGREDIENTS: 1 lb dry ziti pasta
REMAINING INGREDIENTS: 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 dish.
Cook the pasta on the stove top.
In a large bwol, prepare the ziti sauce by combining all of the ziti sauce ingredients.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the mozzarella, breadcrumbs, romano, and parm. Then add garlic, oil, and parsley and mix.
Pour 1/2 cup ziti sauce into dish. Put pasta in remaining sauce and mix then pour into dish. 1 cup mozzarella on top, then ziti topping.
